name: What is FTP?
description:
Functional Threshold Power (FTP) represents your ability to maintain the highest possible power for 1 hour. Regular assessment of FTP gives an indication of whether you are improving your fitness. Your training zones are based on a percentage of FTP, ensuring that each workout is personalised for your needs.
